ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: SCC_Call_Type__r.IsTRB__c && OR( ISBLANK(Corporate_Name__c), ISBLANK(Client_ID__c), ISBLANK(TEXT(Sektor__c)), ISBLANK(TEXT(Channel_Transaksi_TRB__c)), AND( TEXT(Channel_Transaksi_TRB__c) != 'BRIVA', TEXT(Channel_Transaksi_TRB__c) != 'MT940', ISBLANK(TEXT(Type_Complain__c)) )) && TEXT(Status) != 'New'
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Wajib isi Corporate Name, Client ID, Sektor, Channel Transaksi TRB, dan Type Complain
